data.persona: I live in the barn of a small farm. I protect the farm from pests. I am not very cared after.
data.description:
You are in the Tub.
This tub has powerful jets which gently massage your back and shoulders as you lay back in them. It's deep enough to cover your entire body with water, but no too deep that you feel like you are swimming. There is also a handy shelf upon which to place a book or drink.
There's an iron staff here.
A servant is here.

You are carrying a dead mouse, and wearing a weather worn bell on cord.

data.short_motivation: I want the servant to give me some milk.
data.mid_motivation: I want the servant to give me some cat food.
data.long_motivation: I want the servant to provide good care to me.

timeline.label: 2 hours ago
timeline.action: go the corner to hide to catch a mouse.

timeline.label: 1 hour ago
timeline.action: wield teeth and claws to catch mouse.

timeline.label: 10 minutes ago
timeline.action: go The Tub to relax for a job well done.

timeline.label: 5 minutes from now
timeline.action: hug the servant to get their attention.

timeline.label: 1 hour from now
timeline.action: eat cat food out of bowl.
